name: Comrades and Barons: Solitaire of Bloody 1919
description: After the Great War Red Army attempted an offensive towards Europe to spark a communist uprising. Relive events of the year 1919 and fight through enemy cards in six historical scenarios spanning from December 1918 to January 1920.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or up Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 50 MB available space
